title: Reporters' Notebook: The Business Stories We Should Be Thinking About
teaser: CNN's Maggie Lake, CBS's Jill Schlesinger and The Atlantic's Derek Thompson discuss the most important stories they're covering.
contentencoded:
On the final day of Here & Now host Jeremy Hobson’s visit to New York City, he sits down with three of our regular guests who cover business, to take a look at the most important business stories that we should be thinking about, that will impact the world for years to come. He also asksÂ each guest to describe an untold New York City story that reveals something important about the city.

Guests

  • Maggie Lake, business reporter for CNN. She tweets @maggielake.
  • Jill Schlesinger, business analyst at CBS News and host of “Jill on Money.” She tweets @jillonmoney.
  • Derek Thompson, senior editor at The Atlantic. He tweets @DKThomp.
